name: OREKI V2 BETA
description: A cutting-edge WhatsApp bot by Thug TECHIES, designed for automation and enhanced user interaction.

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your SESSION_ID here to authenticate the bot session.

PREFIX.description: Define the bot's command prefix. Options: `all`, `.`, `.*!`

OWNER_NUMBER.description: List of administrator phone numbers (international format without `+`, separate multiple numbers with a comma).

PUBLIC.description: Set the bot's accessibility mode. Options: `public` (everyone) or `private` (admin-only).

AUTHOR.description: Define the author name for the bot's sticker pack.
